abstract: Herman Cain has provided few details of his 9-9-9 tax plan, but what he has made public makes little sense, an economist writes.
snippet: Herman Cain has provided few details of his 9-9-9 tax plan, but what he has made public makes little sense, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Bruce Bartlett held senior policy roles in the Reagan and George H.W. Bush administrations and served on the staffs of Representatives Jack Kemp and Ron Paul. He is the author of the forthcoming book "The Benefit and the Burden."
